ai-patthana17.24:0.2_0: Having given the immaterial states produced by the phenomena that are counterpart of
ai-patthana17.24:1.1_0: corruption, skillful qualities don’t give rise to thoughts, or unskillful qualities. ...
ai-patthana17.24:2.1_0: corruption, skillful qualities don’t give rise to thoughts, or unskillful qualities. ...
ai-patthana17.24:3.1_1: ‘... for the sake of conditioned things.’ ...
ai-patthana17.24:3.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana17.24:4.1_0: Not corrupted or unconditioned, nor deceitful.
